/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of green and brick hues over the road. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens used, adding a unique perspective to the scene.
